name: ds and ml cheatsheets with iris classification
full_name: h1 Awesome Data Science and Machine Learning Cheatsheets and Iris Species Classification h4 Credits Thanks to TensorFlow Team Favio André Vázquez and other contributers for such wonderful work h3 Here are some of my kernel notebooks for Machine Learning and Data Science as follows Upvote them if you like them h1 Iris Species Classification with Custom Training TensorFlow Walkthrough h2 TensorFlow programming h2 Setup program h3 Configure imports and eager execution h2 The Iris classification problem h2 Import and parse the training dataset h3 Download the dataset h3 Inspect the data h3 Create a tf data Dataset h2 Select the type of model h3 Why model h3 Select the model h3 Create a model using Keras h3 Using the model h2 Train the model h3 Define the loss and gradient function h3 Create an optimizer h3 Training loop h3 Visualize the loss function over time h2 Evaluate the model s effectiveness h3 Setup the test dataset h3 Evaluate the model on the test dataset h2 Use the trained model to make predictions h2 License h1 Awesome Data Science and Machine Learning Cheatsheets h2 Table of Contents h1 Business Science h2 Business Science Problem Framework PDF h2 Data Science with Python Workflow PDF h2 Data Science with R Workflow PDF h1 Python h2 Datacamp h2 Python Crash Course h2 Dataquest h2 Others h1 R h2 Datacamp h2 RStudio h1 Math and Calculus h1 Big Data h2 Python h2 R h1 Machine Learning h2 Python h2 R h2 Supervised Learning h2 Unsupervised Learning h2 Hacks tricks and tips h2 Chossing the right model h1 Deep Learning h2 Neural Nets h2 R h2 Python h1 SQL h1 Data Visualization h2 Python h2 R h1 Data Science in General and Others h2 Credits Reference h2 License h3 Please UPVOTE my kernel if you like it or wanna fork it h4 I am open to have your feedback for improving this kernel h3 Thanks for visiting my Kernel and please UPVOTE to stay connected and follow up the further updates
